name: Brick Testing Simulator
description:
Welcome, intern, to your first day at Brick Labs, the foremost research institution for bricks! We have been tasked with testing bricks 3D printed using lunar dirt for use on the moon.

Your job is simple, just break the bricks by changing the temperature in the room and activating the hydraulic press. You will be rewarded for breaking bricks under different conditions and will get nothing if your results are too similar. Those rewards can then be used to upgrade the lab so you can test more bricks. 

Once we have provided NASA with enough unique and juicy brick data, your job is done.

P.S. Keep in mind that changing the temperature can affect the bricks even if they don't freeze or melt, so go ham on that thermostat.
